abdest0-1: Before wudu, we need to have an intention in our hearts that we are going to make wudu.
abdest0-2: After intention for wudu, it is sunnah to say: BISMILLAH (in the name of Allah).
abdest1-1: When you want to make wudu, you have to make intention in your heart and say BISMILLAH, and then it is sunnah to wash hands 3 times with water: firt wash right hand, then left hand.
abdest1-2: Rinse your mouth (with right hand) at least once, max. 3 times, taking water with right hand.
abdest2-1: Rinse your mouth (with right hand) at least once, max. 3 times, taking water with right hand.
abdest3-1: Rinse your nose (with left hand) at least once, max. 3 times with water.
abdest3-2: While washing nostrils, you sniff the water with right hand, and while blowing out, you use left hand.
abdest4-1: Wash face at least once, max. 3 times, from ear to ear, and from hairline to under the chin.
abdest5-1: Wash arms at least once, max. 3 times, from fingertips to above the elbow. First right, then left arm. Make sure no part is left dry.
abdest6-1: Make masah of the head with wet hands once, from the hearline to the back of the head, and vice versa. Make masah of the ears once, with index fingers clean bends of the ears and with the thumbs the back of the ears.
abdest7-1: Wash feets at least once, max. 3 times, from the top of the toes to above the anckles. First right, then left feet.
abdest7-2: It is sunnah to clean between the toes with pinky finger of the left hand.
abdest8-title: Finish your wudu with the dua
abdest8-0: أَشْهَدُ أَنْ لَا إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ وَأَشْهَدُ أَنَّ مُحَمَّدًا عَبْدُهُ وَرَسُولُهُ
abdest8-1: ASH-HADU 'AN LAA 'ILAAHA 'ILLALLAAHU WAHDAHU LAA SHAREEKA LAH, WA 'ASH-HADU 'ANNA MUHAMMADAN 'ABDUHU WA RASOOLUH
abdest8-2: I bear witness that none has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone, Who has no partner, and I bear witness that Muhammad is His slave and His Messenger.
pocetak_namaza: After wudu, stand on a clean place and make intention in your heart to start with specific salah.
pocetni_tekbir: Raise your hands up to your earlobes or shoulders, and say:
vezanje_ruku: Salah starts with opening dua and it is sunnah. Place your right hand over your left, on chest, navel or stomach. One of opening duas on this step is dua:
euza_bismilla_fatiha: Then you recite Auzubillah and Bismillah quietly. Then recite surah Al-Fatiha with tajweed (correct recitation of the Quran)
sunnet_dizanje_ruku_1: Then you say {{zikr}} ({{zikrTr}}) and bow down (go to ruku') during which the worshiper straightens his back and does not throw them out, does not lower his head or straighten up. Place your hands on your knees and spread your fingers.
sunnet_dizanje_ruku_2: Then while you stand up fully straight again, say:
na_rukuu: While on ruku' look at the place of sujood and say 3 times:
padanje_na_sedzdu: After that, go down into prostration (sujood) and say {{zikr}} ({{zikrTr}}) while going down.
na_sedzdi: Place your face between palms of hands (feets are straight and toes are pointing forward) and say 3 times:
tijelo_na_sedzdi: It is necessary to make sujood with 7 part of the body: forehead, nose, palms of both hands, both knees and inner part of toes, spreading your thighs, not leaning stomach on them, with fingers facing Qiblah.
dizanje_sa_sedzde: Then say {{zikr}} ({{zikrTr}}) while going back from sujood in the sitting position, and while sitting say:
ponovni_odlazak_na_sedzdu: Then make another saying {{zikr}} ({{zikrTr}}) while going to it. At it, as at the previous one, say:
poslije_druge_sedzde: After second sujood, while saying {{zikr}} ({{zikrTr}}) stand up for the next rak'ah.
drugi_rekat: Place again your right hand over your left, and say quietly:
tesehud: Then say {{zikr}} ({{zikrTr}}), sit on your knees, raise your index finger of the right hand, and while looking at it, say:
predavanje_selama: Complete the salah by turning your head over your right shoulder, saying:
predavanje_selama_2: then repeat these words while turning your head over your left shoulder.
namaz_zavrsen: After this, the salah is completed.
skrusenost: You have to humble yourself. To humble yourself is one of the main things in prayer. Allah says in the Quran that believers who are successful are those who humble themselves in prayer
nesto_iz_kurana: After Al-Fatiha recite something from the Quran
ustajanje_sa_sedzde_i_sjedenje: Getting up from sujood and sitting
ustajanje_na_sljedeci_rekat: Standing up for the next reka'ah
tesehud_title: Getting up from sujood and dhikr on tashahud (sitting)
dizanje_ruku: Raising hands same as while first takbeer
sunnet_povratak_sa_rukua_hadis: Allah's Messenger used to raise both his hands up to the level of his shoulders when opening the prayer; and on saying the Takbir for bowing. And on rasinig his head from bowing he used to do the same and then say: "Semi'a l-lahu liman hamidah, Rabbana wa laka l-hamd" and he did not do that in prostration.
sunnet_treci_rekat_hadis: Narrated 'Abdullah bin 'Umar: I saw that whenever Allah's Messenger stood for the prayer, he used to raise both his hands up to the shoulders, and used to do the same on saying Takbir for bowing and on rising his head from it, and used to say: "Sami'a l-lahu liman hamidah." But he did not do that in prostration.
sunneti_povratak_sa_rukua: Sunnah while going back from ruku'
odlazak_na_sedzdu_prvo_rukama: It is sunnah, while going to sujood, to first place hands, and then knees.
sunnet_kaziprst: The Messenger of Allah, sallallaahu 'alayhi wa sallam, would connect the tip of his thumb with the tip of his middle finger by making a link and would point his index finger in the direction of the qibla and his gaze would be directed at him.
sunnet_prvo_sjedenje: It is Sunnah to sit on one's feet in the first sitting and between two prostrations, to straighten the right leg and bend the toes so that they are facing the Qibla, and to bend the left leg and sit on it, or to sit on the ends of the straightened feet
sunnet_zikr_na_sjedenju_title: After saying 'RABIG-FIR-LĪ, RABIG-FIR-LĪ' it is sunnah to say this dhikr:
sunnet_zikr_na_sjedenju_wxyz: ALLAHUMMAGHFIRLI, WARHAMNI, WAHDINI, WAJBURNI, WA'AAFINI, WARZUQNI, WARFA'NI.
sunnet_zikr_na_sjedenju: ٱللّهُمَّ ٱغْفِرْ لِي وَٱرْحَمْنِي وَٱهْدِنِي وَٱجْبُرْنِي وَعَافِنِي وَٱرْزُقْنِي وَٱرْفَعْنِي
sunnet_zikr_na_sjedenju_tr: O Allah, forgive me, have mercy on me, guide me, strenghten and enrich me, grant me healt and protection, provide me with sustenance and raise my rank
postavljanje_sutre: Sutrah is an object used as a barrier between himslef and one passing in front of him. It can be a chair, wall, pillar, or even the back of the man who is praying in front of us.
sunneti_na_sjedenju_izmedju_sedzdi: Sunnah while sitting between two sujoods
predaja_selama_sunnet_1_wxyz: ALLAHUMMA ANTAS-SALAM WA MINKAS-SALAM, TABARAKTA YA DHAL-JALALI WAL-IKRAM
predaja_selama_sunnet_1: ٱللَّهُمَّ أَنْتَ ٱلسَّلَامُ وَمِنْكَ ٱلسَّلَام تَبَارَكْتَ يَا ذَا ٱلْجَلَالِ وَٱلْإِكْرَام
predaja_selama_sunnet_1_tr: O Allah, You are peace, from You is all peace, blessed are You, O Possessor of majesty and honour
predaja_selama_sunnet_2_wxyz: ALLAHUMMA AI'NNI ALA ZIKRIKA, WA SHUKRIKA, WA HUSNI 'IBAADATIK
predaja_selama_sunnet_2: ٱللِّهُمَّ أَعِنِِّي عَلَىٰ ذِكْرِكَ وَشُكْرِكَ وَحُسْنِ عِبَادَتِكَ
predaja_selama_sunnet_2_tr: O Allah, help me remember You, to be grateful to You, and to worship You in an excellent manner
pocetna_dova_sunnet_title: Other opening duas you can recite
pocetna_dova_1: ٱللَّهُ أَكْبَرُ كَبِيرًا وَٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ كَثِيرًا وَسُبْحَانَ ٱللَّهِ بُكْرَةً وَأَصِيلًا
pocetna_dova_1_wxyz: ALLAHU AKBARU KABIRA, WAL-HAMDU LILLAHI KATHIRA, SUBHANALLAHI BUKRATAN WA-ASEELA
pocetna_dova_1_tr: Allah is Most Great and much praise be to Allah and glorified be Allah at the beginning and end of the day
sunnet_zikr_rukuu_sedzda_1_wxyz: SUBHANAK-ALLAHUMMA, RABBANA WA BIHAMDIKA, ALLAHUM-MAGHFIR LI
sunnet_zikr_rukuu_sedzda_1: سُبْحَانَكَ ٱللَّهُمَّ رَبَّنَا وَبِحَمْدِكَ , ٱللَّهُمَّ ٱغْفِرْ لِي
sunnet_zikr_rukuu_sedzda_1_tr: Glory is to You, O Allah, our Lord, and praise is Yours. O Allah, forgive me
sunnet_zikr_rukuu_sedzda_2_tr: You are the Most Glorious, the Most Holy, the Lord of the angels and Jibril
semiallahu_limen_hamideh_tr: Allah heard the one who praised Him
esselamu_alejkum_ve_rahmetullah_tr: May peace and the mercy of Allah be upon you
ettehijjatu_2: ٱلسَّلَامُ عَلَيْكَ أَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِيُّ وَرَحْمَةُ ٱللَّهِ وَبَرَكَاتُهُ
ettehijjatu_2_wxyz: AS-SALAAMU 'ALAYKA AYYUHAN-NABIYYU WA RAHMETULLAHI WA BARAKAATU.
ettehijjatu_3: ٱلسَّلَامُ عَلَيْنَا وَعَلَىٰ عِبَادِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلصَّالِحِين
ettehijjatu_3_wxyz: AS-SALAAMU ALAYNA, WA ALAA IBAADI-LLAHIS SAALIHEEN.
ettehijjatu_4: أَشْهَدُ أَنْ لَا إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا ٱللَّه
ettehijjatu_5_wxyz: WA ASHHADU ANNA MUHAMMADAN ABDUHU WA RASOOLUH
ettehijjatu_1_tr: All compliments are for Allah, and prayers and good deeds.
ettehijjatu_2_tr: Peace be upon you, O Prophet, and the mercy of Allah and His blessings.
ettehijjatu_3_tr: Peace be upon us and on the righteous servants of Allah.
ettehijjatu_4_tr: I bear witness that there is no god but Allah
ettehijjatu_5_tr: and I bear witness that Muhammad is His servant and messenger.
salavati_1: ٱللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَىٰ مُحَمَّدٍ وَعَلَىٰ آلِ مُحَمَّد
salavati_1_wxyz: ALLAHUMMA SALLI 'ALAA MUHAMMADIN WA 'ALAA AALI MUHAMMED
salavati_2: كَمَا صَلَّيْتَ عَلَىٰ إِبْرَاهِيمَ وَعَلَىٰ آلِ إبْرَاهِيمَ إِنَّكَ حَمِيدٌ مَجِيد
salavati_2_wxyz: KAMAA SALLAYTA 'ALAA IBRAHEEMA WE 'ALAA AALI IBRAHEEM, INNAKA HAMEEDUM MAJEED.
salavati_3: ٱللَّهُمَّ بَارِكْ عَلَىٰ مُحَمَّدٍ وَعَلَىٰ آلِ مُحَمَّد
salavati_3_wxyz: ALLAHUMMA BAARIK 'ALAA MUHAMMADIN WA 'ALAA AALI MUHAMMED
salavati_4: كَمَا بَارَكْتَ عَلَىٰ إِبْرَاهِيمَ وَعَلَىٰ آلِ إبْرَاهِيمَ إِنَّكَ حَمِيدٌ مَجِيد
salavati_4_wxyz: KAMAA BAARAKTA 'ALAA IBRAHEEMA WA 'ALAA AALI IBRAHEEMA, INNAKA HAMEEDUM MAJEED.
salavati_1_tr: O Allah, send Your mercy upon Muhammad and the family of Muhammad
salavati_2_tr: just as You sent mercy upon Ibrahim and the family of Ibrahim. Truly You are Praiseworthy and Glorious.
salavati_3_tr: O Allah, send blessings upon Muhammad and the family of Muhammad
salavati_4_tr: just as You sent blessings upon Ibrahim and the family of Ibrahim. Truly You are Praiseworthy and Glorious.
allahumme_rabbena_1: رَبَّنَا آتِنَا فِي ٱلدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةً وَفِي ٱلْآخِرَةِ حَسَنَةً وَقِنَا عَذَابَ ٱلنَّار
allahumme_rabbena_1_wxyz: ALLAHUMME RABBANA AATINA FID-DUNYA HASANATAN WA FIL-AAKHIRATI HASANATAN WA QINA ‘ADHAABAN NAAR.
allahumme_rabbena_3_wxyz: WA LIL MU'MININA YAUMA YAQUMUL HISAB.
allahumme_rabbena_1_tr: O our Lord, give us good in this world and the good in the hereafter and protect us from the punishemnt of the Fire.
allahumme_rabbena_2_tr: Our Lord, forgive me, my parents
allahumme_rabbena_3_tr: and the believers on the Day of Judgement.
rabigfirli: رَبِّ ٱغْفِرْ لِي رَبِّ ٱغْفِرْ لِي
rabigfirli_tr: O my Lord, forgive me, O my Lord, forgive me
zikr_na_povratku_sa_rukua: After you are standing upright, and before going to sujood, say:
rabbena_lekel_hamd_tr: Our Lord, to You is all praise
subhane_rabijel_eala_tr: Glory be to my Lord, the Highest
subhane_rabijel_azim_tr: Glory be to my Lord, the Great
subhaneke_1_tr: O Allah, glory and praise are for You.
subhaneke_4_tr: and there is no god but You.
euza_tr: I seek protection in Allah from the rejected Satan
bismillah_tr: In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful
fatiha_1_tr: Praise be to Allah, Lord of all the worlds;
fatiha_2_tr: The Most Gracious, the Most Merciful;
fatiha_3_tr: Master of the Day of Recompense (Judgement day);
fatiha_4_tr: You alone we worship, and You alone we ask for help;
fatiha_5_tr: Guide us on the straight path;
fatiha_6_tr: the path of those who You have bestowed favors;
fatiha_7_tr: not of those who have evoked Your anger or those who are astray.
ihlas_3_tr: He neither begets nor is born,
ihlas_4_tr: Nor is there to Him any equivalent!"
kevser_1_tr: Indeed, We have granted you abundant goodness,
kevser_2_tr: so pray and sacrifice to your Lord alone,
kevser_3_tr: indeed, only the one who hates you is truly cut off from any goodness.
for_more_info: All your questions, advices, critics you can send on our facebook page or through e-mail adress:
author: Author
vaktija_obavestenje: Attention: Prayer times are available only for some Bosnian, Serbian, and Montenegrian cities
moreApps: Take a look on other apps of the same author
sunnet_ruku_zikr_1_wxyz: RABBANA WA LAKAL-HAMDU HAMDAN KATHIRAN TAYYIBAN MUBARAKAN FIHI.
sunnet_ruku_zikr_1_tr: Our Lord, to You be praise - infinite praise, beautiful praise in which (for us) every blessing is.
sunnet_ruku_zikr_1: رَبَّنـا وَلَكَ الحَمْـدُ حَمْـداً كَثـيراً طَيِّـباً مُـبارَكاً فيه
compass_error: To use the compass, you must give the app permission to use your location. Close the app, then open it, and try again
support_mnamaz_app: Support the app that has 100,000+ downloads
donate_1: The "mNamaz" app helps beginners learn to perform prayer correctly.
donate_2: The app has been translated into several languages, has over 100,000 downloads worldwide, and is constantly evolving to provide more useful and beginner-friendly content.
donate_3: The app aims to be translated into as many languages as possible to help users worldwide learn how to perform prayer.
donate_4: Your donation supports the translation of the app into new languages, app development, educational material recording, and advertising.
donate_warning: WARNING: The only correct donation profile is the one accessed through the app or the website mnamaz.com
